title: Premium Wireless Headphones
description: Experience crystal-clear sound with our flagship wireless headphones. Featuring active noise cancellation, 40-hour battery life, and premium comfort. These headphones deliver an immersive audio experience with deep bass, clear mids, and crisp highs. The adaptive noise cancellation technology automatically adjusts to your environment, ensuring you hear every detail of your music.

title: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Track your health and fitness goals with precision. Built-in GPS, heart rate monitoring, and 7-day battery life make this the perfect companion for your active lifestyle. Monitor your steps, calories, sleep patterns, and workout intensity with advanced sensors.

title: Designer Leather Jacket
description: Handcrafted genuine leather jacket with premium stitching. A timeless piece that combines style and durability. Made from the finest full-grain leather that ages beautifully over time, developing a unique patina. The classic motorcycle-inspired design features YKK zippers.

title: Minimalist Desk Lamp
description: Elegant LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Perfect for any modern workspace, featuring touch controls and a sleek aluminum design. The lamp offers three color modes and stepless dimming to create the perfect ambiance for any task.

title: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Sustainably sourced 100% organic cotton t-shirt. Soft, breathable, and eco-friendly. This premium tee is made from GOTS-certified organic cotton, ensuring no harmful chemicals were used in production. The fabric is pre-shrunk and garment-dyed for lasting color and fit.

title: Yoga Mat Pro
description: Premium non-slip yoga mat with extra cushioning. Ideal for all types of yoga and fitness exercises. Made from eco-friendly TPE material that's free from PVC, latex, and harmful chemicals. The textured surface provides superior grip even during intense sessions.

title: Ceramic Coffee Mug Set
description: Set of 4 handcrafted ceramic mugs. Each mug features a unique artisan glaze pattern, making every set truly one-of-a-kind. These mugs are made by skilled craftspeople using traditional pottery techniques. The thick ceramic walls keep your beverages hot longer.

title: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator and overheat protection. Delivers up to 15W of fast charging power to compatible devices. The non-slip silicone surface keeps your phone securely in place while charging.

title: Running Shoes Elite
description: High-performance running shoes with responsive cushioning and breathable mesh upper. Engineered for serious runners, these shoes feature advanced foam technology that provides energy return with every stride. The engineered mesh upper adapts to your foot shape while keeping you cool.

title: Leather Wallet
description: Slim genuine leather wallet with RFID protection. Holds up to 12 cards plus cash in a compact design. Made from premium full-grain leather that develops a rich patina over time. The RFID-blocking technology keeps your cards safe from electronic theft.

title: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Waterproof portable speaker with 360Â° sound and 20-hour battery life. Perfect for outdoor adventures, pool parties, and travel. The rugged design is IP67 rated, meaning it's completely waterproof and dustproof. The dual drivers deliver rich, balanced sound.

title: Scented Candle Collection
description: Set of 3 luxury scented candles made from natural soy wax. Each burns for 40+ hours, filling your space with sophisticated fragrances. The collection includes three carefully curated scents: Lavender Calm, Citrus Energy, and Vanilla Comfort.

title: Ultra-Slim Laptop
description: Powerful ultra-slim laptop with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD. Perfect for professionals and students who need performance and portability. Features a stunning 14-inch display with vivid colors and crisp details. The all-day battery life keeps you productive without searching for outlets.

title: Mechanical Keyboard
description: Premium mechanical keyboard with RGB backlighting and hot-swappable switches. Built for gamers and typists who demand the best. The aluminum frame provides durability and a premium feel. Choose your preferred switch type for the perfect typing experience.

title: Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision gaming mouse with 16000 DPI sensor and customizable RGB lighting. Designed for competitive gaming with ultra-fast response times. The ergonomic shape fits perfectly in your hand for long gaming sessions. Programmable buttons let you customize your gameplay.

title: USB-C Hub
description: 7-in-1 USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, SD card reader, and power delivery. Expand your laptop's connectivity with this compact hub. Supports 4K display output and fast data transfer. The aluminum body matches your devices perfectly and provides excellent heat dissipation.

title: Smart Home Speaker
description: Voice-controlled smart speaker with premium sound quality. Control your smart home, play music, get weather updates, and more with simple voice commands. The 360-degree sound fills any room with rich audio. Set timers, reminders, and alarms hands-free.

title: 4K Webcam
description: Professional 4K webcam with autofocus and low-light correction. Perfect for video calls, streaming, and content creation. The wide-angle lens captures more of your space. Built-in dual microphones with noise reduction ensure clear audio. Easy plug-and-play setup.

title: Portable SSD
description: Ultra-fast portable SSD with 1TB storage and USB 3.2 Gen 2 interface. Transfer large files in seconds with read speeds up to 1050MB/s. The compact, durable design fits in your pocket and protects your data from drops. Compatible with all devices.

title: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
description: Premium wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and spatial audio. Immerse yourself in your music with adaptive ANC that blocks out distractions. The comfortable fit stays secure during workouts. Touch controls make it easy to manage calls and music.

title: Slim Fit Jeans
description: Classic slim fit jeans made from premium denim with stretch comfort. These jeans offer the perfect balance of style and comfort. The modern slim fit flatters all body types. Quality stitching and durable fabric ensure these jeans will last for years.

title: Cashmere Sweater
description: Luxurious 100% cashmere sweater with ribbed cuffs and hem. Experience unparalleled softness and warmth with this premium sweater. The timeless crew neck design works for any occasion. Hand-washable and pill-resistant for lasting quality.

title: Classic Sneakers
description: Timeless canvas sneakers perfect for everyday wear. These iconic sneakers never go out of style. The cushioned insole provides all-day comfort. Durable rubber outsole offers excellent traction. Easy to clean and maintain.

title: Leather Belt
description: Genuine leather belt with classic buckle. Crafted from full-grain leather that gets better with age. The reversible design gives you two belts in one. Adjustable sizing ensures a perfect fit. A wardrobe essential for any professional.

title: Aviator Sunglasses
description: Classic aviator sunglasses with polarized lenses and UV400 protection. These iconic sunglasses combine style and function. The polarized lenses reduce glare and eye strain. Lightweight metal frame for all-day comfort. Includes protective case and cleaning cloth.

title: Canvas Backpack
description: Durable canvas backpack with leather accents and laptop compartment. This versatile backpack is perfect for work, school, or travel. The padded laptop sleeve protects devices up to 15 inches. Multiple pockets keep you organized. Adjustable straps ensure comfortable carrying.

title: Dress Shirt
description: Premium cotton dress shirt with modern fit and wrinkle-resistant fabric. Look sharp all day with this professional dress shirt. The breathable cotton blend keeps you comfortable. Easy-care fabric resists wrinkles. Classic design works for any business setting.

title: Watch Strap
description: Premium leather watch strap with quick-release pins. Upgrade your watch with this handcrafted leather strap. The genuine leather develops a beautiful patina over time. Quick-release pins make swapping straps effortless. Compatible with most 20mm and 22mm watches.

title: Throw Blanket
description: Soft knit throw blanket perfect for cozy evenings. Made from ultra-soft microfiber that gets softer with every wash. The generous size is perfect for cuddling on the couch. Machine washable for easy care. Available in beautiful neutral tones.

title: Decorative Pillows Set
description: Set of 2 decorative throw pillows with removable covers. Transform your living space with these stylish pillows. The high-quality fabric is durable and easy to clean. Removable covers with hidden zippers for easy washing. Filled with plush down-alternative.

title: Wall Art Set
description: Modern abstract wall art set of 3 canvas prints. Elevate your space with this contemporary art collection. High-quality printing on premium canvas. Ready to hang with included hardware. The neutral color palette complements any decor style.

title: Essential Oil Diffuser
description: Ultrasonic essential oil diffuser with LED mood lighting. Create a relaxing atmosphere with this elegant diffuser. The ultrasonic technology preserves the therapeutic properties of essential oils. Runs for up to 10 hours on a single fill. Auto shut-off for safety.

title: Storage Baskets Set
description: Set of 3 woven storage baskets with handles. Organize your home in style with these versatile baskets. Made from natural materials for a rustic look. The sturdy handles make them easy to carry. Perfect for toys, blankets, magazines, and more.

title: Bath Towel Set
description: Luxury bath towel set with 6 pieces including bath towels and hand towels. Experience spa-quality softness with these premium Turkish cotton towels. Highly absorbent yet quick-drying. The elegant dobby border adds a touch of sophistication. Machine washable.

title: Kitchen Knife Set
description: Professional kitchen knife set with wooden block. This comprehensive set includes all the knives you need for cooking. High-carbon stainless steel blades stay sharp longer. Ergonomic handles provide comfort and control. The wooden block keeps knives organized.

title: Smart Thermostat
description: WiFi-enabled smart thermostat with energy-saving features and voice control. Control your home's temperature from anywhere with the mobile app. Learn your schedule and adjust automatically to save energy. Compatible with most heating and cooling systems.

title: Resistance Bands Set
description: Complete resistance bands set with 5 levels of resistance. Perfect for home workouts, physical therapy, and strength training. Made from durable latex that won't snap or break. Includes door anchor, handles, and ankle straps. Portable and easy to use anywhere.

title: Insulated Water Bottle
description: Stainless steel insulated water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. The double-wall vacuum insulation works perfectly in any weather. Wide mouth opening makes filling and cleaning easy. Leak-proof lid with carrying handle.

title: Camping Tent
description: 4-person camping tent with easy setup and waterproof rainfly. Perfect for family camping trips and outdoor adventures. The spacious interior has room for sleeping bags and gear. Mesh windows provide ventilation while keeping bugs out. Comes with carry bag.

title: Hiking Backpack
description: 40L hiking backpack with adjustable suspension system and rain cover. Designed for day hikes and weekend trips. The ventilated back panel keeps you cool on the trail. Multiple compartments organize your gear. Hydration compatible with reservoir sleeve.

title: Bike Helmet
description: Lightweight bike helmet with MIPS protection and adjustable fit system. Safety meets style in this modern helmet design. The MIPS technology provides additional protection against rotational forces. Twenty vents keep you cool on long rides. Reflective elements enhance visibility.

title: Foam Roller
description: High-density foam roller for muscle recovery and flexibility. Essential for pre and post-workout routines. The textured surface provides deep tissue massage. Durable construction won't lose shape over time. Includes exercise guide with 20 stretches.

title: Golf Balls
description: Premium golf balls with soft feel and low compression. Pack of 12 high-performance golf balls designed for distance and control. The soft cover provides excellent greenside spin. Durable construction maintains performance round after round. Visibility coating makes them easy to track.

title: Tennis Racket
description: Lightweight tennis racket with oversized head for power and forgiveness. Perfect for intermediate to advanced players. The graphite construction provides excellent feel and control. Pre-strung and ready to play out of the box. Includes protective cover.

title: Basketball
description: Official size basketball with superior grip and durability. Suitable for indoor and outdoor play. The composite leather cover provides excellent grip in all conditions. Deep channels allow for better ball control. Includes pump and needle for easy inflation.

title: Swim Goggles
description: Anti-fog swim goggles with UV protection and adjustable straps. Crystal-clear vision for pool and open water swimming. The silicone gaskets create a comfortable, leak-free seal. Anti-fog coating lasts swim after swim. Wide peripheral vision for better awareness.

title: Adjustable Dumbbell Set
description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbell set that replaces 15 sets of weights. Perfect for home gyms with limited space. Quickly adjust weight from 5 to 52.5 pounds with the turn of a dial. Durable construction built to last. Comes with storage tray.

title: Yoga Blocks Set
description: Set of 2 high-density foam yoga blocks for support and stability. Essential props for beginners and advanced yogis alike. The non-slip surface provides secure grip. Lightweight yet supportive for all poses. Beveled edges for comfort. Easy to clean.
